import React,{useEffect,useState}from "react" import Skeleton,{SkeltonTheme}from "react-loading-skeleton" import"./card.css" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import { useLayoutEffect } from "react" const Cards=({movie})=>{ canst[isLoading,SetIsLoading]=useState(true) useEffect(() =>{ setTimeout(()=>{ setIsLoading(false) },1500) },[]) return<> { isLoading ?
:
{movie?movie.original_title:""}
{movie?movie.release_date:""} {movie?movie.vote_average:""}
{movie ? movie.overview.slice(0,118)+"..." : ""}
} } export default Cards
